p: The O 6 -BG-based BGSN3 is a good substrate for the two protein-tags used ( Table 1 and Figure 2(A)) and offering the advantage to sufficiently expose the azide group for the Huisgen reaction. This was the starting point to examine: (i) the labelling efficiency of the clickable-SNAP and clickable- H 5 by using different DBCO-based fluorophores; (ii) the specificity of the “click” reaction.
